name: Mattisu
description:
GET THE BAFTA! Avoid incoming asteroids! GO GO at the speed of light!

Accelerate - Up/W
Steer - Left/Right Arrow (A or D keys)
Fullscreen - F4

Uploaded as a part of my 'Summer Vinter' games galore. Read about it here: http://www.roflgames.com/

Can also be played in your browser: RoflGames.com/Mattisu (v1.0, HTML5)
